已过时的 API

目录

  • 已过时的注释类型
  • 已过时的方法
  • 已过时的构造器
  • 已过时的枚举常量
  • 已过时的注释类型 
    注释类型和说明
    com.whaleal.mars.bson.codecs.pojo.annotations.Collation
  • 已过时的方法 
    方法和说明
    com.whaleal.mars.core.query.Update.addFieldOperation(String, String, Object)
    com.whaleal.mars.core.query.Query.isRestrictedTypeKey(String)
    don't call this method as the restricted type handling will undergo some significant changes going forward.
    com.whaleal.mars.core.aggregation.stages.filters.Filters.jsonSchema(String, Object)
    use Filters.jsonSchema(Document) instead
    com.whaleal.mars.core.query.Query.maxTime(long, TimeUnit)
    . Use Query.maxTime(Duration) instead.
    com.whaleal.mars.core.query.BasicUpdate.pushAll(String, Object[])
    com.whaleal.mars.core.query.Update.pushAll(String, Object[])
    as of MongoDB 2.4. Removed in MongoDB 3.6. Use $push $each instead.
    com.whaleal.mars.core.query.Meta.setMaxTime(long, TimeUnit)
    . Use Meta.setMaxTime(Duration) instead.
    com.whaleal.mars.core.query.Query.slaveOk()
    since 3.0.2, use Query.allowSecondaryReads().
    com.whaleal.mars.core.aggregation.expressions.StringExpressions.substr(Expression, int, int)
    Deprecated since version 3.4: $substr is now an alias for StringExpressions.substrBytes(Expression, int, int)
  • 已过时的构造器 
    构造器和说明
    com.whaleal.mars.session.option.CollectionOptions(Long, Long, Boolean)
    please use CollectionOptions.empty() as entry point.
    com.whaleal.mars.gridfs.Lazy(Supplier<? extends T>)
    prefer Lazy.of(Supplier), to be turned private in 2.5.
  • 已过时的枚举常量 
    枚举常量和说明
    com.whaleal.mars.bson.codecs.pojo.StorageType.SCRIPT
    com.whaleal.mars.core.query.Meta.CursorOption.SLAVE_OK
    since 3.0.2, use Meta.CursorOption.SECONDARY_READS instead.
